Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory737.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Tracks. They went that way.', 4: '1'}
{3: "No. 21 points at the Hetero-Creature tracks she just discovered. It's a drag mark."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Salans, is there anything out of the ordinary at the northwest base recently?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Salans', 3: 'Musar, Lilin, Canon, come over here. Have you guys noticed anything unusual on your patrols?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Musar', 3: 'Northwest? Nothing I can remember.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Musar', 3: "I've been guarding the south for the past week. The north was... the boy and... Um, the boy and the girl alternated.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Musar points at Canon. Canon is about to answer Vera's question, but Lilin cuts her off."}
{2: 'Lilin', 3: 'I assure you there have been no monsters in the northwest in the past few days, or I would have reported it already!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lilin', 3: "But I think I haven't seen anyone pass through that main road these days.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lilin', 3: "Usually, we'd see merchants or other travelers on this road two or three times a day.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Vera focuses her eyes on the only person who hasn't spoken but speaks in a hesitant tone, taken aback when she realizes that the girl isn't human."}
{2: 'Canon', 3: "...What Lilin said is exactly what I've seen, too.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Canon', 3: 'But I did notice that the woods near the northwest recon point are quieter than usual.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Canon', 3: "The birds there don't chirp anymore. And the breeze seemed... for two days it was too humid, and another day too dry.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lilin', 3: "I've never heard a bird call around there. Where can you find birds here?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Canon', 3: 'Deep in the forest. Those little critters are having a difficult life, too.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Lilin looks at Canon with suspicion. Whether it's work or personal, what Canon said seems not very credible."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'I think we should go take a look. If these clues do mean something, we might still make it in time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Hey, the guy responsible for the south. Just to make sure, is there anything unusual in the South?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Musar', 3: "Let me think... No. There's a field of tall grass in the south, but no path. Nobody passes through there anyways. There are no trees, and so no birds to begin with.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'No. 21 opens her terminal to show Vera a photo.'}
{3: 'In a pool of purple-red liquid lies a worn bracelet with alternating bands of red and grey.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Vera moves one step over and waves for Salans to come for a look. He nods solemnly after seeing the photo.'}
{2: 'Salans', 3: "This belongs to Vane. It's her late sister's. Vane always carries it with her.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Salans, we'll need someone familiar with the northwest to go with us for an investigation.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'But just be warned that we might run into Hetero-Creatures.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'My team and I will do everything we can to protect your man. We will need him to keep an eye out for traces of or items belonging to those that went missing.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Can I take her?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera points at Canon.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lilin', 3: "She's not familiar with their items and habits! Salans, let me go with them! I will find everyone! I want to see Saran again.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Salans', 3: "...Canon doesn't pay much attention to others. What about Lilin? He might be young, but he can carry out missions on his own.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Salans', 3: 'He also knows everyone well.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "...Okay, let's do that, but know that you'll have to follow my orders.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lilin', 3: "I will! If we see a monster, I will hide right away and won't get in your way.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Also, be aware that we still have no idea what's going on.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "We're heading out to make sure nothing bad will happen again. Our goal is not to rescue the missing people. I hope we are clear on that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Salans', 3: 'I understand, but... I still hope that if you see any of them, please bring them back. Even one is better than none.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "And I'll send two members down south. Pick out a few who can fight or run at least. The south is safer, relatively speaking, and they'll be scouting there.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Some people might have run outside the base in a panic.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Salans approaches a few middle-aged men who begin checking their weapons and belongings after hearing the order.'}
{3: 'Then, he waves at Musar and Canon as they walk toward the group of men.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'You, and you. You two go with the group. Remember that if you spot a bunch of enemies at once, run for it immediately.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'The Two Constructs', 3: 'Roger that!', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Also, keep an eye on that Construct and make sure she's not someone who escaped the Purifying Force.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "If she is, just report her all the way up without going through me. If she's not, just leave her be.", 4: '1'}
{3: "The two Constructs nod their heads and follow Vera's line of sight to look at Canon."}
{1: '1', 3: 'As if sensing attention, Canon suddenly turns around and scans her surroundings. The two Constructs quickly take their eyes off her and pretend to talk about the mission.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'You three, stay in the Conservation Area with the medic. Stay vigilant, and contact me if anything comes up.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'The Three Constructs', 3: 'Roger that!', 4: '1', 5: '2', 6: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'No. 21! No. 21? What are you doing scurrying about? Time for work.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Buddy... Buddy is not here.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I can feel it, but Buddy is not here.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "Open, Buddy, open your eyes! ...It won't open. I can't see what Buddy is seeing.", 4: '2'}
{3: "No. 21 shows her fangs like an angry lion, but she can't find her foe."}
{3: "She faces the ground with an empty stare. As she tries, again and again, to sync with her Co-Bot, her pupils continue to dilate and contract like camera lenses that can't find their focus."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'When did that happen? Just now?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'This frame connects differently to Buddy.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I can only feel a weak...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'No. 21 stares off into the distance and focuses all her energy on searching for the weak signal from the Co-Bot.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab'}
{3: 'A shock of pain travels through No. 21 like a venomous snake racing through her veins.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Don't concentrate all your computing power to your M.I.N.D. port! Are you trying to fry your brain?!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'But I need to do something about Buddy!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'No. 21, try to see if you can sense a general direction.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21 closes her eyes and scans through a mess of signals for the familiar one.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'We\'ve got to go. We need to make a trip up northwest. If you "sense" something different from Co-Bot later, we\'ll act accordingly.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Scanning through the base one last time, the white-haired girl responds positively to the order.'}
